ability.Technician: This Pokemon's moves of 60 power or less have 1.5x power, including Struggle.
ability.Metalic Surge: When this Pokemon enters the battle, its Speed is increased by 1 stage.

Steel Cutter.effect: Hits five times. Each hit has a 30% chance to lower the target's Defense by 1 stage.

Quik Pinch.effect: Raises the user's Speed by 1 stage before attacking.

Iron Buzz.effect: Has a 20% chance to confuse the target.

Sharp Agility.effect: Raises the user's Speed and Accuracy by 1 stage each.
